entities.name: hepzibah
entities.description: Hepzibah is a person who is interacting with Tom and Voldemort. She is described as happily saying 'Now then' and whispering to Tom.

entities.name: hokey
entities.description: Hokey is an elf who is obediently taking away the boxed cup from Hepzibah.

entities.name: tom
entities.description: Tom is a person who is being addressed by Hepzibah and is described as 'dear boy'. He is likely a child or someone close to Hepzibah.

entities.name: burke
entities.description: Burke is a person who knows that Hepzibah has the locket and would love to get it back when she's gone. He is mentioned as selling the locket to Hepzibah.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person who reaches out his hand without invitation to hold the locket and stares at it in fascination. He recognizes Slytherin's mark on the locket.

relationships.description: Hepzibah is interacting with Hokey, who is obediently taking away the boxed cup.
Hepzibah is addressing Tom and whispering to him.
Voldemort reaches out his hand without invitation to hold the locket, which belongs to Hepzibah.
Burke sold the locket to Hepzibah.
